00114 //Determine if this item can receive this attachment.  This is different, in that it may
00115 //be possible to have this attachment on this item, but may already have an attachment on
00116 //it which doesn't work simultaneously with the new attachment (like a silencer and duckbill).
00117 BOOLEAN ValidItemAttachment( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, UINT16 usAttachment, BOOLEAN fAttemptingAttachment );

00219 // Snap: GetTotalVisionRangeBonus checks for light levels
00220 // and returns cumulative bonus from the following functions:
00221 //
00222 // GetVisionRangeBonus applies to all light levels
00223 // GetNightVisionRangeBonus: bLightLevel > NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY, above ground only
00224 // GetCaveVisionRangeBonus: bLightLevel > NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY, underground only
00225 // GetDayVisionRangeBonus: NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY <= bLightLevel < NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT
00226 // GetBrightLightVisionRangeBonus: bLightLevel < NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY
00227 // (remember: darker is higher!)
00228 INT16 GetTotalVisionRangeBonus( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT8 bLightLevel );
00229 
00230 // Snap: Scale night vision bonus with light level
00231 INT16 NightBonusScale( INT16 bonus, UINT8 bLightLevel );
